title: I Provide These Services
description: I can say I am versatile professional! From graphic and branding to more complex development solutions!

service.title: WEB DESIGN
service.description: I develop websites in HTML5 and CSS3. Using CSS frameworks such as Bootstrap, Susy, Skeleton, among others, which greatly increases productivity.

service.title: PRINT & BRANDING
service.description: I create and develop brands, printed layouts, such as magazines, posters, folders and cards.

service.title: MARKETING/SEO
service.description: I help with company marketing and content optimization for search engines, as Google and Bing.

service.title: DEVELOPMENT
service.description: I can work with several technologies. I have solid knowledge in PHP, CSS, SQL, NoSql and Javascript.
